amendment.description: An amendment numbered 43 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to prohibit remote work agreements for HUD employees when the alternative worksite is located within a 50 mile radius of a HUD office.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
